mapper.select: SELECT (t.course_name || ' ---- ' || t.course_code) as "label", t.course_id as "value" FROM T_JW_COURSE t WHERE VALID_FLAG = '1' and t.course_name like '%'||#{name}||'%'
SELECT dic_code id,dic_name text FROM t_sys_userdic WHERE valid_flag = '1' and dic_type = #{name} ORDER BY dic_order
SELECT role_id id,role_name text FROM t_sys_role

SELECT decode(DEPT_NAME, '', t.name, t.name || ' ---- ' || DEPT_NAME) as "label", decode(DEPT_ID, '', t.person_id, DEPT_ID || ',' || t.person_id) as "value" FROM T_RS_EMPLOYEE t LEFT JOIN (SELECT R.PERSON_ID PERSON, D.DEPT_NAME, D.DEPT_ID FROM T_RS_EMPLOYEE_DEPT R, T_SYS_DEPT D WHERE R.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID) ON T.PERSON_ID = PERSON WHERE VALID_FLAG = '1'
and t.name like '%${name}%'

SELECT decode(DEPT_NAME, '', t.name, t.name || ' ---- ' || DEPT_NAME) as "label", decode(DEPT_ID, '', t.person_id, DEPT_ID || ',' || t.person_id) as "value" FROM T_RS_EMPLOYEE t LEFT JOIN (SELECT R.PERSON_ID PERSON, D.DEPT_NAME, D.DEPT_ID FROM T_RS_EMPLOYEE_DEPT R, T_SYS_DEPT D WHERE R.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID) ON T.PERSON_ID = PERSON WHERE VALID_FLAG = '1'
and t.PERSON_ID not in (select TEACHER_PERSON_ID as id from T_JW_EXAM_TEACHER where EXAM_ID = #{examId} union select TEACHER_ID as id from T_JW_EXAM_EXAMINATION where EXAM_ID = #{examId})

SELECT decode(DEPT_NAME, '', t.name, t.name || ' ---- ' || DEPT_NAME) as "label", decode(DEPT_ID, '', t.person_id, DEPT_ID || ',' || t.person_id) as "value" FROM T_RS_EMPLOYEE t LEFT JOIN (SELECT R.PERSON_ID PERSON, D.DEPT_NAME, D.DEPT_ID FROM T_RS_EMPLOYEE_DEPT R, T_SYS_DEPT D WHERE R.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID) ON T.PERSON_ID = PERSON WHERE VALID_FLAG = '1' AND decode(DEPT_NAME, '', t.name, t.name || ' ---- ' || DEPT_NAME) like '%${name}%'
SELECT (t.course_name || ' ---- ' || t.course_code) as "label", t.course_id as "value" FROM T_JW_COURSE t WHERE VALID_FLAG = '1'
SELECT t.class_name as "label", t.class_id as "value" FROM T_XG_CLASS t WHERE VALID_FLAG = '1'
SELECT t.class_name || '--' || FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(t.training_level, 'ZXZYPYCC') as "label", t.class_id as "value" FROM T_XG_CLASS t WHERE VALID_FLAG = '1' and t.departments_id = #{deptId}

SELECT dept_id id, dept_name name, parent_dept_id pid, case when length(DEPT_ID) > 3 then 0 else 1 end as "open" FROM t_sys_dept UNION SELECT e.person_id || ',' || ed.dept_id id, e.name, ed.dept_id pid, 0 as "open" FROM t_rs_employee e, t_rs_employee_dept ed WHERE e.person_id = ed.person_id AND e.VALID_FLAG = '1'

SELECT dept_id id, dept_name name, parent_dept_id pid FROM t_sys_dept WHERE dept_type < 9 AND valid_flag = 1 UNION SELECT d.major_code id, d.major_name name, d.departments_id pId FROM T_XG_MAJOR d WHERE d.valid_flag = 1 UNION SELECT class_id id, class_name name, major_code pid FROM t_xg_class WHERE valid_flag = 1 UNION SELECT s.student_id || ',' || sc.class_id id, s.name, sc.class_id pid FROM T_XG_STUDENT s, T_XG_STUDENT_CLASS sc WHERE sc.student_id = s.student_id and sc.class_id in (select tt.class_id from T_XG_CLASS tt where tt.VALID_FLAG = '1') AND s.valid_flag = 1

SELECT dept_id id, dept_name name, parent_dept_id pid FROM t_sys_dept WHERE dept_type < 9 AND valid_flag = 1 UNION SELECT d.major_code id, d.major_name name, d.departments_id pId FROM T_XG_MAJOR d WHERE d.valid_flag = 1 UNION SELECT class_id id, class_name name, major_code pid FROM t_xg_class WHERE valid_flag = 1 UNION SELECT s.student_id id, s.name, sc.class_id pid FROM T_XG_STUDENT s, T_XG_STUDENT_CLASS sc WHERE sc.student_id = s.student_id and sc.class_id in (select tt.class_id from T_XG_CLASS tt where tt.VALID_FLAG = '1') AND s.valid_flag = 1

SELECT dept_id id, dept_name name, parent_dept_id pid FROM t_sys_dept WHERE dept_type < 9 AND valid_flag = 1 UNION SELECT d.major_code id, d.major_name name, d.departments_id pId FROM T_XG_MAJOR d WHERE d.valid_flag = 1 UNION SELECT class_id id, class_name name, major_code pid FROM t_xg_class WHERE valid_flag = 1 UNION SELECT re.parent_id || ',' || s.student_id || ',' || rela.class_id as id, s.name || ' 家长' name, rela.class_id pId FROM t_xg_parent_student re, t_xg_student s, T_XG_STUDENT_CLASS rela WHERE s.student_id = re.student_id AND s.student_id = rela.student_id

SELECT decode(t2.CLASS_NAME, '', t.name, t.name || ' ---- ' || t2.class_name) as "label", decode(CLASS_ID, '', ',' || t.student_id, CLASS_ID || ',' || t.student_id) as "value" FROM T_XG_STUDENT t , (SELECT R.STUDENT_ID STUDENT, D.CLASS_NAME, D.CLASS_ID FROM T_XG_STUDENT_CLASS R, T_XG_CLASS D WHERE R.CLASS_ID = D.CLASS_ID AND D.VALID_FLAG = '1') t2 where T.student_id = t2.STUDENT

SELECT decode(t2.CLASS_NAME, '', t.name, t.name || ' ---- ' || t2.class_name) as "label", decode(CLASS_ID, '', ',' || t.student_id, CLASS_ID || ',' || t.student_id) as "value" FROM T_XG_STUDENT t , (SELECT R.STUDENT_ID STUDENT, D.CLASS_NAME, D.CLASS_ID FROM T_XG_STUDENT_CLASS R, T_XG_CLASS D WHERE R.CLASS_ID = D.CLASS_ID AND D.VALID_FLAG = '1') t2 where T.student_id = t2.STUDENT AND decode(t2.CLASS_NAME, '', t.name, t.name || ' ---- ' || t2.class_name) like '%${name}%'
SELECT PARENT_NAME as "label", PARENT_ID as "value" FROM T_XG_PARENT t
SELECT DEPT_ID "value",DEPT_NAME "label" FROM T_SYS_DEPT
SELECT DEPT_ID "value",DEPT_NAME "label" FROM T_SYS_DEPT WHERE DEPT_NAME like '%${name}%'
SELECT FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(#{code}, #{dicName}) FROM dual

SELECT DEPT_ID "id",DEPT_NAME "text" FROM T_SYS_DEPT
WHERE DEPT_TYPE = #{type}

SELECT MAJOR_ID "id",MAJOR_NAME "text" FROM T_XG_MAJOR
WHERE DEPARTMENTS_ID = #{deptId} AND VALID_FLAG = 1

SELECT MAJOR_ID "id",MAJOR_NAME "text" FROM T_XG_MAJOR t1 where (select count(CLASS_ID) from T_XG_CLASS t2 where t2.MAJOR_CODE = t1.MAJOR_CODE and t2.VALID_FLAG='1' and t2.MAJOR_DIRECTION = t1.MAJOR_DIRECTION) > 0
and DEPARTMENTS_ID = #{deptId}

SELECT DISTINCT MAJOR_CODE || ',' || TRAINING_LEVEL || ',' || MAJOR_DIRECTION id, MAJOR_NAME || ' -- ' || FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(TRAINING_LEVEL, 'ZXZYPYCC') || ' -- ' || FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(MAJOR_DIRECTION, 'ZXZYFX') text FROM T_XG_MAJOR WHERE DEPARTMENTS_ID = #{deptId} AND VALID_FLAG = 1
SELECT DISTINCT MAJOR_CODE || ',' || TRAINING_LEVEL id, MAJOR_NAME || ' -- ' || FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(TRAINING_LEVEL, 'ZXZYPYCC') text FROM T_XG_MAJOR WHERE DEPARTMENTS_ID = #{deptId} AND VALID_FLAG = 1

SELECT DISTINCT MAJOR_CODE || ',' || MAJOR_DIRECTION || ',' || TRAINING_LEVEL id, MAJOR_NAME || ' -- ' || FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(MAJOR_DIRECTION, 'ZXZYFX') || ' -- ' || FUNC_GET_DICVALUE(TRAINING_LEVEL, 'ZXZYPYCC') text FROM T_XG_MAJOR WHERE DEPARTMENTS_ID = #{deptId} AND VALID_FLAG = '1'
SELECT CLASS_ID id,CLASS_NAME text FROM T_XG_CLASS WHERE MAJOR_CODE || ',' || MAJOR_DIRECTION || ',' || TRAINING_LEVEL = #{majorShow} AND VALID_FLAG = '1'

SELECT t1.STUDENT_ID id,t1.NAME text FROM t_xg_student t1, t_xg_student_class t2 WHERE t2.CLASS_ID = #{classId} and t1.student_id = t2.student_id ORDER BY FUNC_GET_TABLEVALUE(t1.STUDENT_ID, 'T_XG_STUDENT', 'STUDENT_ID', 'NAME')
SELECT t.TEXTBOOK_ID as "value", t.TEXTBOOK_NAME as "label" FROM T_JW_TEXTBOOK t
select DEPT_ID id,DEPT_NAME text from T_SYS_DEPT where TEACHING_FLAG = '1'
select CLASS_ID id,CLASS_NAME text from T_XG_CLASS where DEPARTMENTS_ID = #{deptId} AND VALID_FLAG = '1'
select CLASS_ID id,CLASS_NAME text from T_XG_CLASS where DEPARTMENTS_ID = #{deptId} AND VALID_FLAG = '1' and MAJOR_CODE = (select MAJOR_CODE from T_XG_MAJOR where MAJOR_NAME = #{name})
select t1.USER_ID "id",t1.NAME text from T_SYS_USER t1,T_RS_EMPLOYEE_DEPT t2 where t1.USER_ID = t2.PERSON_ID and t2.DEPT_ID = #{deptId}
select class_id from T_XG_STUDENT_CLASS t where t.student_id= #{studentId}
select t.NAME from T_XG_STUDENT t where t.student_id =#{studentId}
select t.departments_id,t.major_code,t.class_id,t.CLASS_NAME from T_XG_CLASS t where t.class_id=#{classId}
SELECT dic_name FROM t_sys_userdic WHERE valid_flag = '1' and dic_type = #{name} ORDER BY dic_order
select t.dept_id from T_RS_EMPLOYEE_DEPT t where t.person_id=#{personId} AND rownum=1
select t.idcard as label, t.idcard as value from T_XG_STUDENT t
select t.id as value ,t.dorm_name as label from T_JW_DORM t
select * from T_RS_EMPLOYEE_DEPT_ROLE t where t.role_id = '8cc4ac76-7f01-494a-a83a-da308e2e4fac' and #{id} in person_id
select * from T_RS_EMPLOYEE_DEPT_ROLE t where t.role_id = 'e59b0376-1dbc-4611-9c56-0235096f773b' and #{id} in person_id

SELECT decode(DEPT_NAME, '', t.name, t.name || ' ---- ' || DEPT_NAME) as "label", decode(DEPT_ID, '', t.person_id, DEPT_ID || ',' || t.person_id) as "value" FROM T_RS_EMPLOYEE t LEFT JOIN (SELECT R.PERSON_ID PERSON, D.DEPT_NAME, D.DEPT_ID FROM T_RS_EMPLOYEE_DEPT R, T_SYS_DEPT D WHERE R.DEPT_ID = D.DEPT_ID) ON T.PERSON_ID = PERSON WHERE VALID_FLAG = '1' union all SELECT decode(t2.CLASS_NAME, '', t.name, t.name || ' ---- ' || t2.class_name) as "label", decode(CLASS_ID, '', ',' || t.student_id, CLASS_ID || ',' || t.student_id) as "value" FROM T_XG_STUDENT t , (SELECT R.STUDENT_ID STUDENT, D.CLASS_NAME, D.CLASS_ID FROM T_XG_STUDENT_CLASS R, T_XG_CLASS D WHERE R.CLASS_ID = D.CLASS_ID AND D.VALID_FLAG = '1') t2 where T.student_id = t2.STUDENT
